attributes.action: Stop Being So Politically Correct & Use Some Common Sense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop ridiculous amounts of compensation being paid to immigrants and criminals.

Allow the police to "clip" young offenders round the ear.

Stop giving money to groups that help illegal immigrants to stay in this country.

Most Importantly . . . Protect our national identity and start being proud of being ENGLISH !.
